fazilat_text: There is a hadith: Whoever says "Subhanallah", "Alhamdulillah", "Allahu Akbar" and "La ilaha illallah" 100 times, no one will have a greater reward than him except someone who does even more.
about_description: This is a simple and beautiful Tasbeeh counter app. It is made to help you in your daily Zikr and Dua recitations.
